SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.workflow.api

Class WorkflowServiceDatabaseImpl

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowServiceDatabaseImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkflowServiceDatabase
public class WorkflowServiceDatabaseImpl extends Object implements WorkflowServiceDatabase
Implements WorkflowServiceDatabase. Defines permanent storage for workflow.
